span.p:
apiFetch
frontend/src/lib/api.ts
- builds URL
- attaches Authorization header
- timeout and JSON

div.style: color: rgb(17, 17, 17) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: rgb(17, 17, 17) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Auth decorators
api_auth_required and api_auth_optional
verify_jwt_token
backend/utils/auth_utils.py

div.style: color: rgb(17, 17, 17) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
API endpoints
backend/views/*_api.py
sentence, lemma, phrase, sourcedir, sourcefile
